newsitem.title: JORDAN: Jordan dinar overnight rates rise to 8.96 percent.
newsitem.headline: Jordan dinar overnight rates rise to 8.96 percent.

text.p: The weighted average overnight interbank rate on the Jordanian dinar rose to 8.96 percent on Wednesday from 7.48 percent on Monday, the Central Bank said.
Banks were closed on Tuesday for a public holiday.
The Central Bank said just two banks traded on the market in nine reported transactions with a total value of 8.9 million dinars ($12.6 million).
